I created a simple testcase:

public class LoginTest extends ServletTestCase {

	public void testLogin() throws Exception {
		User user = UserController.createUser("aUser", "sgATmedia-style.com",
				"abc", "abc");
		User user2 = UserController.login("aUser", "abc");
		session.setAttribute(Keys.USER, user2);
		User user3 = WebUtil.getUser(request);
		assertEquals(user2.getUserName(), user3.getUserName());
	}

}

I am not seeing this. I tried it under WTP 1.0 and 1.5m4. Assuming it was fixed by 1.0, I won't worry about it. 

If you are still seeing it, I will dig in a little deeper. I suppose it could be Mac-OS specifc, or it could have something to do with your environment. Did the bug happen when you did a "Run on Server"? If so, did you run a test suite, or just a single test?
